attributes.action: Free dental care for people with the hereditary condition dento~genesis imperfecta
attributes.additional_details: Please sign the petition to help those with the hereditary condition called dento~genesis imperfecta. It is an hereditary condition where the teeth do not have the protective enamel on them making them very weak and prone to damage, rotting and falling out, the teeth also have very small roots so even a slight knock can cause them to come loose. I feel that as this condition is hereditary and no fault to the carrier that dental charges should be waivered.
